The Road to El Dorado

Ano: 2000

IMDb ID: tt0138749

Classificação: 6.9

Sinopse: The story is about two swindlers who get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado, while pulling off some sort of scam. Their plan goes bad and the rogues end up lost at sea after several misfortunes. Oddly enough, they end up on the shores of El Dorado, and are worshipped by the natives for their foreign appearances.—Paolo Costabel
